headline: WYLER CLINOMETER PLUS LEVEL
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Mechanical Inspection Equipment > Other Mechanical Inspection Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Wyler
Model 54-635-601
Description Clinometer Plus Level
Other Information Measuring capacity of ±45 degree.
Four precisely machined exterior reference surfaces assure accuracy and repeatability of measurements in any quadrant.
Selected by push-button, any units suitable for inclination may be applied to the display.
Even slope indication based on a relative base of selectable length is possible
Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.000 in (10.2 cm)
Depth 3.000 in (7.6 cm)
Height 1.250 in (3.2 cm)
Weight 2 lb (1 kg)
